TIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
57 
Chapter 7: NORMAL LABOUR AND DELIVERY- INTRAPARTUM CARE
Labour is diagnosed if there are regular painful uterine contractions accompanied by at least one of the following: 
• Cer
vical changes
• Ruptured membranes
• Show
Admission of a woman in labour 
All women presenting in (suspected) labour must be fully evaluated. This includes history taking, review of the 
antenatal record, clinical examination, and special inv
